sections.MISSION:
SQD X interdicts ENY along AOA #, IOT delay the ENY advance and provide early warning
Additional
sections.PURPOSE: of this operation is to evaluate SLs and TLs ability to effectively employ their elements in the field and improve weak points before upcoming Squadron-level training.

– Battle Drill 1, 2, 2A, 3, and 9.

of Priorities of work, Link-up with TAA

Phase IV, Reconsolidation and Return: Squad leaders conduct an AAR onsite with the Platoon Leadership on general performance. Late-calls awarded to highest performing Squad. RTB and conduct Day 0 recovery.

sections.COORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
The Uniform for this event will be ACUs with boots, gloves, eye pro, ACH, ear pro, NVGs, IOTV with kit, hydration source, M4, primary weapon system w/ BFAs.
Each SQD will ensure teams have all necessary equipment and have bore sighted weapons prior to arrival. MTRs and HQ will serve as C2 nodes. One vic will be needed at each OBJ with 2 pax. WPNs Squads will alternate between roaming OPFOR and friendly attachments.
